root: ^Excuse me, were you here last night?

casual: ^Nah, they ain't biting today.  Weather I s'pose.

c-0: ^It's starting to get cold.  Fish don't like the cold.

story: ^Someone heard a strange noise near here.
^I was just curious about your fishing spot

c-0: ^Ah, there wasn't anything strange goin' on here last night.
c-1: ^Well yesterday I had a great haul.  But now??
